name: Variations
description:
Variations is a small 3D game that combines the ideas of dodgeball and colour matching into a mental workout exercise. Dodgeball is a childhood classic that I've personally enjoyed and I wanted to take the fast-paced action of it and combine it with something else that requires thought and focus. If you misplace a step, it could be game over!

How to Play:

The player's color will indicate which dodge ball colour you must hit. If you hit the correct colour, your player's colour will switch.

Arrow keys to move around. Space bar to jump.

You can choose to jump over the projectiles or sidestep them, but make sure to not fall into the pit nor hit the wrong colour!
